enhancements.title: Unify header heights & back button placement
enhancements.rationale: Inconsistent header heights across screens reduce visual cohesion. Standardizing header height (56dp) and back button placement improves navigation predictability.
acceptance: Back button positioned consistently (16dp from left edge)

enhancements.title: Add large, collapsible titles to top-level screens
enhancements.rationale: Large titles improve scanability and provide clear context. Collapsible behavior maintains screen real estate while scrolling.
acceptance: Large titles (32px) visible on initial load

enhancements.title: Predictive search with inline suggestions + recent history
enhancements.rationale: Enhances discoverability and reduces typing effort. Recent history provides quick access to previously viewed content.
acceptance: Search suggestions appear as user types

enhancements.title: Deep-link support for all detail screens
enhancements.rationale: Enables sharing and deep navigation from notifications, external links, and QR codes.
acceptance: All detail screens have deeplink paths

enhancements.title: Bottom tab ripple + subtle haptic on switch
enhancements.rationale: Provides immediate tactile feedback confirming tab selection. Ripple effect enhances visual feedback.

enhancements.title: Breadcrumb/progress for multi-step flows
enhancements.rationale: Provides clear progress indication and reduces abandonment in complex flows (adoption, onboarding, pet creation).
acceptance: Swipe back navigates to previous step

enhancements.title: Adopt 4/8px spacing grid; remove rogue paddings
enhancements.rationale: Consistent spacing grid creates visual rhythm and reduces layout inconsistencies.
acceptance: All spacing values use 4px or 8px multiples

enhancements.title: Establish consistent type ramp (12/14/16/20/24/32)
enhancements.rationale: Standardized type scale improves readability and visual hierarchy.
acceptance: Dynamic Type scaling tested up to 200%

enhancements.title: Tighten heading letter-spacing; increase body line-height
enhancements.rationale: Optimized typography improves readability and reduces eye strain.

enhancements.title: Replace hardcoded bolds with tokenized weights
enhancements.rationale: Ensures consistent font weight usage across the app.

enhancements.title: Responsive container widths on tablets
enhancements.rationale: Optimizes layout for larger screens while maintaining mobile-first design.
acceptance: Content width maxes at 768px on tablets

enhancements.title: Standardize radii (xsâ€¦full) and elevation steps
enhancements.rationale: Consistent radii and elevation create cohesive visual language.

enhancements.title: Introduce layout breakpoints for small tablets (grid/list toggles)
enhancements.rationale: Leverages tablet screen space for improved content density.

enhancements.title: Normalize primary/secondary/surface/onSurface usage
enhancements.rationale: Eliminates color inconsistencies and ensures proper contrast ratios.

enhancements.title: Add high-contrast theme variant toggle
enhancements.rationale: Improves accessibility for users with visual impairments.

enhancements.title: Define focus/pressed/disabled tokens across all components
enhancements.rationale: Ensures consistent interactive states across the app.
acceptance: All interactive components have focus states

enhancements.title: Replace magic numbers with tokens (spacing/radius/opacity)
enhancements.rationale: Improves maintainability and ensures design consistency.

enhancements.title: Semantic feedback colors (success/warn/error/info) with accessible contrast
enhancements.rationale: Provides clear visual feedback for user actions.
acceptance: All feedback colors meet WCAG AA contrast

enhancements.title: AMOLED true-black option for dark mode
enhancements.rationale: Reduces battery consumption on AMOLED displays.

enhancements.title: Tokenized gradient palette with named ramps (hero, CTA, backgrounds)
enhancements.rationale: Ensures consistent gradient usage across the app.

enhancements.title: Consolidate buttons to canonical set (primary/secondary/ghost)
enhancements.rationale: Reduces component complexity and ensures consistent button behavior.
acceptance: Three button variants: primary, secondary, ghost

enhancements.title: Empty-state templates with illustration + CTA
enhancements.rationale: Improves UX when no content is available and guides user actions.

enhancements.title: Global skeleton loaders (list, card, avatar, chart)
enhancements.rationale: Improves perceived performance during data loading.
acceptance: Skeleton variants for list, card, avatar, chart

enhancements.title: Consistent error banners with retry + diagnostics
enhancements.rationale: Provides clear error feedback and recovery options.

enhancements.title: Reusable form field set (label, helper, error, counter)
enhancements.rationale: Ensures consistent form UX across the app.
acceptance: FormField component with label, helper, error, counter

enhancements.title: Unified toast/snackbar system with queueing
enhancements.rationale: Provides consistent notification UX with proper queuing.

enhancements.title: Segmented controls with scrollable chips for dense filters
enhancements.rationale: Improves filter UX with compact, scrollable controls.

enhancements.title: Universal share/action sheet with safe defaults
enhancements.rationale: Provides consistent sharing UX across platforms.

enhancements.title: Press feedback: scale(0.98) + shadow soften + haptic (impact light)
enhancements.rationale: Provides immediate tactile and visual feedback on interaction.

enhancements.title: List reordering with spring physics + hints
enhancements.rationale: Enables intuitive list reordering with clear visual feedback.

enhancements.title: Success celebration (confetti/checkmark morph) on key actions
enhancements.rationale: Provides delightful feedback for successful actions.

enhancements.title: Shared-element transitions between list â†” detail
enhancements.rationale: Creates smooth, cohesive navigation experience.

enhancements.title: Pull-to-refresh elastic with progress affordance
enhancements.rationale: Provides clear visual feedback during refresh operations.

enhancements.title: Page transitions aligned with platform idioms (cupertino/material)
enhancements.rationale: Matches platform conventions for familiar UX.

enhancements.title: Micro-delays (30â€“60ms) to chain animations for natural cadence
enhancements.rationale: Creates natural-feeling animation sequences.

enhancements.title: Cursor/touch trail disabled by default; enable for debug
enhancements.rationale: Provides debug tool for motion analysis without affecting production.

enhancements.title: Virtualize long lists; memoize heavy rows
enhancements.rationale: Improves scroll performance and reduces memory usage.
acceptance: FlashList or FlatList used for long lists

enhancements.title: Pre-warm images with priority hints + fade-in placeholders
enhancements.rationale: Improves perceived performance and reduces layout shifts.

enhancements.title: Split bundles; lazy-load rarely used screens
enhancements.rationale: Reduces initial bundle size and improves TTI.

enhancements.title: Replace PNGs with WebP/AVIF where supported
enhancements.rationale: Reduces image file sizes and improves load times.
acceptance: Fallback to PNG for unsupported devices

enhancements.title: Cache static gradients/shadows as bitmaps
enhancements.rationale: Reduces render cost of complex gradients and shadows.

enhancements.title: Audit Reanimated worklets for JS thread hits
enhancements.rationale: Ensures animations run on UI thread for smooth performance.
acceptance: All animations run on UI thread

enhancements.title: Remove off-screen DOM bridges; reduce layout thrash
enhancements.rationale: Eliminates unnecessary layout calculations.

enhancements.title: Image CDN params (size/quality) matched to device DPR
enhancements.rationale: Serves appropriately sized images for device pixel ratio.

enhancements.title: Accessible names/roles/states on all interactive elements
enhancements.rationale: Enables screen reader users to navigate and interact with the app.

enhancements.title: Focus order & escape routes for modals/sheets
enhancements.rationale: Ensures keyboard and screen reader users can navigate modals.

enhancements.title: Dynamic Type scaling up to 200% without clipping
enhancements.rationale: Supports users who require larger text sizes.

enhancements.title: Larger touch targets + hitSlop on dense lists
enhancements.rationale: Improves usability for users with motor impairments.

enhancements.title: Gestures alternatives for non-gesture users
enhancements.rationale: Ensures all functionality accessible without gestures.

enhancements.title: Descriptive alt text; skip decorative images
enhancements.rationale: Improves screen reader experience.

enhancements.title: High-contrast focus rings; visible keyboard focus
enhancements.rationale: Ensures keyboard navigation is clearly visible.
acceptance: Focus rings visible on all interactive elements

enhancements.title: Native date/time pickers by platform
enhancements.rationale: Matches platform conventions for familiar UX.

enhancements.title: Android back gesture parity with header back
enhancements.rationale: Ensures consistent back navigation on Android.

enhancements.title: iOS edge swipe-to-go-back with tuned thresholds
enhancements.rationale: Enables familiar iOS navigation gesture.

enhancements.title: Haptics categories mapped to intent (impact/notification)
enhancements.rationale: Provides appropriate tactile feedback for different actions.

enhancements.title: System share sheet integration
enhancements.rationale: Leverages native sharing capabilities.

enhancements.title: Respect OS reduced-motion; swap motion for fades
enhancements.rationale: Supports users who prefer reduced motion.

enhancements.title: Inline async validation + progress affordance
enhancements.rationale: Provides immediate feedback during form validation.

enhancements.title: Undo/confirm for destructive actions
enhancements.rationale: Prevents accidental data loss.

enhancements.title: Keyboard management: next/return flows + safe area paddings
enhancements.rationale: Improves form completion UX.

enhancements.title: Masked inputs with live formatting (phone/card)
enhancements.rationale: Improves input UX and reduces errors.

enhancements.title: Auto-save drafts + offline queue
enhancements.rationale: Prevents data loss and enables offline form completion.

enhancements.title: One-tap error focus jump to first invalid field
enhancements.rationale: Improves form completion UX.

enhancements.title: Progressive image loading with dominant-color placeholders
enhancements.rationale: Improves perceived performance and reduces layout shifts.

enhancements.title: Avatar fallback generator (initials + gradient)
enhancements.rationale: Provides consistent avatar appearance when images unavailable.

enhancements.title: Smart cropping & focal point for hero images
enhancements.rationale: Ensures important image content remains visible.

enhancements.title: Lottie micro-animations for onboarding tips
enhancements.rationale: Provides engaging, lightweight animations.

enhancements.title: Blur-up transitions for gallery grids
enhancements.rationale: Improves perceived performance during image load.

enhancements.title: Lightweight parallax on hero headers (auto-disabled on low-end)
enhancements.rationale: Adds visual interest without performance cost.

enhancements.title: Interaction traces: capture tap â†’ render timings per screen
enhancements.rationale: Enables performance monitoring and optimization.

enhancements.title: Visual regression snapshots for critical components
enhancements.rationale: Prevents unintended visual changes.

enhancements.title: In-app "Report UI Issue" sheet (auto-attaches screenshot + route + device info)
enhancements.rationale: Enables users to report UI issues with context.
